title: "just fight trynd before he has full fury lol"
body:
*trynd crits 3 times in a row with 10% crit chance and then ignites you*

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/363482504943894538/537046273530920980/8f8.png

replies.body:
Step 1: Stab Pencil In Brain
Step 2: Pick This Brick {{champion:86}} 
Step 3: Build Q and rush Randuin's
Step 4: Shit on him with Q and don't let him go near minions without punishment

That's how toplane works
Had that happen to me once at level 1.  Lovely game.
nothing like getting back to back crit at level 1 vs tryndamere and being told "the second crit didn't even matter."
-enters a ptsd panic attack that lasts for hours-
